page.title: 14Employment _local survey
page.content: We did a survey in one of the classes in our school.The survey was to see how many mums had a job and how many Dads had a job.I surveyed twenty three people and 17% of the dads have no jobs and 53% of the mums haven't jobs. I asked the people how many dads worked at Flimby and how many mums worked at Flimby 10% of dads worked at Flimby and 33% of mums worked at Flimby.I asked how many Dads worked away from Flimby and I got 90% and I got 67% from the mums.The most popular job for the Dads is Thames Board mills the wood and paper factory.The popular job for the mams is working at Greggains in a shop stacking shelves.
